text: Allie V. Craycraft, Jr. (born May 30, 1932) is an American former politician from the state of Indiana. A Democrat, he served in the Indiana State Senate from 1978 to 2006.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/4501/allie- craycraft-jr#.VZkzRWTBzGc Craycraft is currently an Associate Pastor at the Illuminate Church in Muncie. In 2016, he was elected as the Delaware County Democratic Party Chairman. His son, Steve, currently serves as Delaware County Auditor ==References== Category:Living people Category:1932 births Category:Indiana state senators
title: Allie Craycraft
